snippet.title: Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle - Official Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show 2023
snippet.description:
Invader Studios shows off the gameplay for Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle, the third-person survival horror prequel to the critically acclaimed Daymare: 1998, where H.A.D.E.S. agent Dalila Reyes freezes and defeats some mutated monsters. Daymare: 1994 Sandcastle releases August 30, 2023 on PlayStation, Xbox, and PC.

#IGN #SoG #Gaming
